clinical_study.brief_title: Metabolic and Hemodynamic Effects of the Inhibitors of Type 2 Sodium Glucose Co-transporters (ISGLT2) in Diabetic Patients With Heart Failure
clinical_study.official_title: Metabolic and Hemodynamic Effects of the Inhibitors of Type 2 Sodium Glucose Co-transporters (ISGLT2) in Diabetic Patients With Heart Failure. GLUCOSUR-IC Study

brief_summary.textblock: Inhibitors of the type 2 sodium-glucose co-transporter (iSGLT2) may improve the metabolic and hemodynamic profile in patients with DM2 and heart failure.

primary_outcome.description: Changes in cardiac biomarkers: NTproBNP, CA125 and ST2

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in quality of life: EuroQol-5D questionnaire (EuroQol five dimension questionnaire)
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in patient's quaility of life by 5Q questionnaire (EuroQol standardised, non-disease-specific instrument for health-related quality of life with 2 parts: first one score from 3-3-3-3 (worst) to 1-1-1-1 (best) and second one which a visual scale scores form 0 (worst)-100 (best). EuroQol-a new facility for the measurement of health-related quality of life. Health Policy 1990;16:199-208. El EuroQol-5D: una alternativa sencilla para la medición de la calidad de vida relacionada con la salud en atención primaria. Aten Primaria 2001; 28:425-429.)
Changes in pulmonary congestion by pulmonary echocardiography
Changes in functional capacity by the 6 minute-walk

arm_group.description: Patients with diabetes and heart failure that are treated with iSGLT2

intervention.description: Treatment with empaglifozine 10 mg/day (may be also dapaglifozine 10mg/day depending on clinical trial results)

study_pop.textblock: Consecutive patients with type 2 diabetes and heart failure who attend a university hospital heart failure unit.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Type 2 Diabetes
- HbA1c> 6.5%
- Estimated GF> 45 ml / min
- BMI: ≥25 Kg / m2
- Stable pharmacological treatment of Heart Failure in the last 3 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Diabetes type 1 or type LADA (presence of antibodies against GAD and/or IA-2 positive)
- DM2 with C-peptide <1 ng / mL
- GEF <45 ml / min
- Recurrent urinary tract infections

facility.name: Germans Trias i Pujol University Hospital
